text: Juanchaco Airport is an airport serving the Pacific coast village of Juanchaco in the Valle del Cauca Department of Colombia. The airport is at the end of a peninsula above Málaga Bay,USGS - Málaga Bay and south approaches and departures are over the water. ==See also== * * *Transport in Colombia *List of airports in Colombia ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Juanchaco *Google Maps - Juanchaco Category:Airports in Colombia Category:Colombia transport-related lists
title: Juanchaco Airport
